title: What are the characteristics of dark matter that scientists are looking for? - Quora

response.answer_text: Everything! Its fundamental nature. It's currently thought to be a massive, weakly interacting particle, so knowing what that particle is, how it interacts, its mass, spin, and so on, would be useful. Knowing how to make it, where it came from, how clumpy it really is, would also be good to know.  Of course, it might not be a particle at all. But it might also be a whole diverse universe of particles!
